summary: Male Nord Follower, No DLC Required
descriptionHtml:
NO DLC REQUIRED

Ulfhjart is no nonsense barbarian; his mission is to destroy the enemy FAST.

Perks: Bladesman, Devastating Blow, Unhindered, Conditioning, Deadly Bash, Deep Wounds, Limbsplitter, Skullcrusher

Combat Style: Devastating Offense

Strengths: One handed, Two Handed, and Block

Lesser Attributes: Heavy armor, light armor, archery, and sneak

**Can use onehanded weapons as well, but excels with heavy melee weapons.
_________________________________________________________________________________________

Ulfhjart is a warlord of a companion in terms of staying power and can deal huge amounts of damage in melee. As a result, he is vulnerable to magic and arrows.

Set as essential, can be disabled if you want to; give this proud Nord a glorious death!

Max Level = 81

Can be found drinking at the Inn in Dawnstar; the one where you first encounter Erandur. PRIEST OF MARA 8-O
__________________________________________________
INSTALLATION

Simply drag the contents of this folder into your Skyrim Data folder.

__________________________________________________

Thanks for downloading!
Now stand still as Ulfhjart buries this warhammer in a bandit's face.
author: DaveEscape
